metadata.name: Suspicious Base64 Encoded User-Agent
metadata.comment: Detects suspicious encoded User-Agent strings, as seen used by some malware.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM http_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (startswith(lower(http_request.user_agent), lower('q2hyb21l')) OR startswith(lower(http_request.user_agent), lower('qxbwbgvxzwjlax')) OR startswith(lower(http_request.user_agent), lower('rgfsdmlr')) OR startswith(lower(http_request.user_agent), lower('tw96awxsy')))

output.summary: Detects suspicious encoded User-Agent strings, as seen used by some malware.
